name: Revolution
description:
TheManor.Farm is the first stage of a revolution in yield farming / lending protocol on Binance Smart Chain Network (BSC).

The Manor Farm was developed in response to the vacuum left by generic projects with no long term plan for sustainability. We have developed unique functions that create decentralized ownership and sustainable rewards through a multi-layer protocol.

Transfer of ownership from Layer 1 to Layer 2 happens only 14 days after L1 starts.
Those who contribute their (REV) tokens to the Layer 2 presale will get a 20% better exchange rate than those who get in with BUSD and significantly larger allocations on the L2 farm (DOGS) and governance (PIGS) tokens.

Stakers of the (PIGS) tokens on L2 become the owners of the farm earning their share of the deposit fees and other farm associated cashflows
